name: all things left behind
description:
This is a piece still in the making

There is an island off the coast, where the past and present meet. Where we go again, for the first time too place a slivers of our self, and rebuild with whats left.

Too leave slivers of your self, and find what has been left by others.

All these things have been left behind.

An online game, that allows you to anonymously place small parts of yourself on a digital island.

And to explore what others have left before you.
